Detailed Description

Provider for SMS tamplates. Template texts are defined in SmsTextMaps.

Following column ids are defined:
c_sms_recno_id NumberType Returns row + 1.
c_sms_pos_id NumberType Returns row + 1.
c_sms_status_id NumberTypeTpdu::Status enum (usually Tpdu::Unsent)
c_mmisms_template_title_id WStringType The The title for the template.
c_sms_string_id WStringType The template text.
c_sms_msg_type_id NumberType MessageTypeIndicator::Type enum (usually MessageTypeIndicator::ReservedType).
c_sms_conc_status_id NumberType ConcatenetedStatus enumeration (usually NormalSms).
c_sms_dcs_id NumberType DataCodingScheme value (usually 0).
